product_name: Badger Anti-Bug Sunscreen SPF 34 - 2.9 fl. oz.
long_description: All natural Badger Anti-Bug SPF 34 sunscreen helps keeps the bugs at bay and protects from the sun, and does it all without the use of DEET. Provides broad spectrum protection from UVA and UVB rays using non-nano zinc oxide. Water-resistant formula retains SPF protection for 40 min. of activity in water; reapply frequently. Some of the essential oils used to provide bug protection include citronella, cedar and lemongrass. Badger Anti-Bug Sunscreen is certified to contain at least 70% organic ingredients.
short_description: All natural Badger Anti-Bug SPF 34 sunscreen helps keeps the bugs at bay and protects from the sun, and does it all without the use of DEET.
